column5: I am leaving for Sioux Lookout on 9/4/10. Is the construction on 502 completed?Thanks in advance.wmd

We came down 502 last Thursday and there was NO construction. Can't say the same about Highway 53 going into IF that was ate up with single lane traffic and follow vehicles. The waits weren't bad but it slowed us up some.
502 was perfect on 8-20-2010. just a short wait at bridge work in Ft. Francis. we had very windy weather and it kept us off the water a little bit, left a few more for your group.
